name: GirlsCraft: My Adventure
description:
A girl named Elsa went on a journey full of adventures in the wonderful world filled with cute animals and colorful landscapes. Explore the map to find resources, build your dream house from a different colored blocks, create the interior of your choice - use your imagination and fantasy.

2 game modes are waiting for you, the new maps, biomes and more space for research of the game world. In classic mode you need to collect resources, craft items yourself and monitor their health, and Creative are available to you all the resources of the game, infinite health and the flight.
